title: Technical Lead/Mentor
workSummary: Mentored the team through different aspects of career challenges and grew their development skills.
responsibilities: Help overcome challenges the mentee faces in all aspects of his career
Alleviate the client from hand-holding the mentee
Accelerate mentee career growth
Make sure to exhibit best practices and good coding skills
toolsAndTechnologies: CI/CD using AWS Code Build and Code Pipeline

title: CTO
workSummary: Leading the team from the front, performing code reviews, and system design. Ensuring compliance with software development standards and maintaining code quality.
responsibilities: Lead the team from the front, do code reviews, and system design
Communicate with the cross-department team, gather requirements, and maintain quality of code
Compliance with the software development standards and processes
Understand the technical aspects and business flow of the projects
Validate the technical specification according to business requirements prior to development
Responsible for the success of the release with respect to the completeness and accuracy of their piece of work
Make sure to exhibit best practices and good coding skills
Recruitment and Training of resources

projects.description: As CTO, I transformed a struggling QR menu app for luxury hotels in the MENA region. The app lets guests order food and services by scanning QR codes in hotel areas. I hired the right talent, streamlined processes and integrated with major POS systems, and payment gateways moreover by implementing key features to compete in this industry and maintaining quality, we boosted monthly revenue from $500k to $10k in 9 months, making the app a reliable and scalable solution for luxury hotels, and enhancing guest experiences significantly.

title: Senior Technical Lead
workSummary: Showcased rapid progression from a Software Engineer to Technical Lead, leading code reviews, system design, and ensuring adherence to software development standards.
responsibilities: Progressed rapidly from Software Engineer to Technical Lead, showcasing expertise and leadership
Led the team in code reviews, system design, and ensured adherence to software development standards
Compliance with the software development standards and processes
Effectively communicated with offshore teams, gathered requirements, and maintained code quality
Demonstrated deep understanding of technical and business aspects, validating specifications and driving successful releases
Recruitment and Mentoring of resources

title: Software Engineer
workSummary: As part of the primary developer's team, contributed to the development and maintenance of Artstor, a U.S product as a frontend and microservices developer.
responsibilities: Part of the primary developer's team of U.S product 'Artstor' as a frontend and microservices developer
Design, code, and debug its different modules in various software languages
Support, maintain, and document software functionality
Follow Behavior-driven development to analyze the user story and write unit test cases
Performance tuning, improvement, usability, and automation
Work in an Agile/Scrum methodology environment

title: Software Engineer
workSummary: Developed lightweight, cross-browser, single-page apps using MEAN stack and communicated project progress with clients.
responsibilities: Develop a lightweight, cross-browser, single-page app that talks to REST API
Develop web apps using MEAN (MongoDB, Express, Angular, Node.js) technologies
Communicate with clients and update them about project progress
Write unit tests using a stack of Mocha, Chai and SuperTest
